function_description: Editing the name of an existing list
initial_state: The user is on a board page with at least one list already created and displayed.
steps: Locate the list whose name you want to edit.
Click on the three dots in the top-right corner of the list to open the options menu.
Select the 'Edit Name' option from the menu.
Enter the new name for the list.
expected_state: The list is displayed with the new name, replacing the old one.
